This page covers biological details of component Cajal Nucleus.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Midbrain Mesencephalon -> Mesencephalic Reticular Formation (MM.MRF) -> Cajal Nucleus (HMA.MM.CJ) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaHMA Head Motor Area]
  * *Function*: Integration of head and eye movements, controls vertical gaze
  * *Notes to function*: Projects to CN3, CN4 nuclei, rotation of body about its long axis, Project to vestibular nuclei
